arts.ttl: Milan aims to beat Pisa with Leao and Gimenez leading the attack
arts.sum: No talk of a runaway, since it’s only the eighth round of the league. Max Allegri made that clear yesterday in the press conference. But if Milan beat Pisa tonight at San Siro, they will be four points clear at the top, at least for one night. Last Sunday, the Rossoneri returned to first place […]
